59 
 
DEGREE AWARDING  
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY   UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  
  
 
  (xxiii) UNIZIK does not accept Government or 
Geography.  All Direct Entry candidates must 
satisfy the UTME requirements.  
(xxiv) UNIZIK requires at least two (2) ‘A’ level 
passes to include Accounting or Economics.  
UNIZIK and ESUTECH require that Direct Entry 
applicants possess UTME requirements.  
(xxv) UNN accepts in addition to the UTME 
requirements   
a) HND/ND/NCE in relevant programmes.   
b) Complete pass in Intermediate ICAN 
examination or equivalents.   
c) Pass in the final exams of the Chartered 
Institute of Secretaries.  
(xxvi) UYO accepts ND/HND lower credit in relevant 
programmesl. All Direct Entry candidates 
must satisfy the UTME requirements.  
(xxvii) UYO  accepts  ND/HND  in 
 relevant  
programmes. All Direct Entry candidates must 
satisfy the UTME requirements.  
(xxviii) WELSPRING accepts IJM B, NABTEB A’ level, 
NCE, ND, HND, at merit/lower credit from 
recognised institutions, as well as 
foundation/intermediate passes at ICAN, 
ACCA and ICMA.  
  
UTME  
(i) AUN same as in Finance   
(ii) BIU accepts credit/merit in English language and 
Mathematics at TC II as 'O' Level equivalent.  
(iii) EVANGEL- Economics is not compulsory but 
accepts any three (3) relevant subjects.    
(iv) FED-DUTSINMA requires five (5) ‘O’ level credits 
passes to include: English Language,
